pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider W Forever: A to Z/The Gaia Memories of Fate (2010, movie)$(br2)Used to craft Eternal's $(l:w/devices/lostdriver_eternal)Lostdriver (Eternal)$(/l)$(br2)Used to access Eternal's $(l:w/riders/eternal#blue_flare)Blue Flare$(/l)
